name: A Santa Claus: Christmas Gifts Free - 3D Sleigh Driving Game with Cartoon Graphics for Everyone
name_original: A Santa Claus: Christmas Gifts Free - 3D Sleigh Driving Game with Cartoon Graphics for Everyone
description:
Christmas is coming. The most beautiful holiday of the year will be again full of joy and happiness. More and more trees are decorated, people play beautiful games, they are preparing they gifts - only one thing misses! A nice driving app for the holiday season, featuring Santa!

Santa Claus, and his preferred reindeer, Rudolph are prepared for the game. The sleigh has been set by the elves, so know we are waiting for Santa Claus and a reindeer to fly that sleigh to the world. Rudolph, the red nosed reindeer is not just qualified for the task, but it's the preferred leader of the reindeer pack, Santa Claus loves him so much, that Rudolph will accompany him in this unique mission this time.

This is not a common „gift run”. Not just a „snowing and Santa Claus is coming to town” routine, not a common sleigh game! It's the ultimate Christmas challenge for Santa Claus and Rudolph - it is the Driving Skill Test before Christmas! The Sleight can be full of presents, it can be snowmen dancing around, houses can be decorated with lights, but if Santa Claus fails the test, it will be no Christmas this year. Of course, Santa never ever failed a test, but who knows, right?

The place is a common middle American village, called Averageville. Gifts are wrapped, Trees are set, children are having fun: meanwhile it snows in he city. Santa Claus and Rudolph are ready for the challenge.
If you fail, all presents will stay with the elves and you must try to make your Santa Driver test again!

Features:
* A game with real Christmas feeling, where we can drive Santa's sleigh
* Exciting settings include a Christmas village, snow covered highway and other interesting places.
* Basic control is very easy to handle, but alternatives can be found using Settings.
* Different obstacles, like roaming animals, cars passing by etc.
* A lot of interesting power ups, like slowing time, or coin magnet.
* Competition using Game Center.
* Achievement system using Game Center
* We can deliver presents not just with skates and chairs, but with a nice truck, sleigh and other vehicles.
